issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
If an application has an outstanding request on a node, the fair scheduler may try to place a container on that node without checking whether that node's rack needs any containers.  If the rack doesn't need any containers, none should be scheduled on the node.

This can cause an NPE in the fair scheduler.
fields.summary: Fair scheduler doesn't check whether rack needs containers before assigning to node
